name: HomologicalComplex.instIsStrictlySupportedStupidTrunc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
⊢ (K.stupidTrunc e).IsStrictlySupported e
decl:
instance : IsStrictlySupported (K.stupidTrunc e) e := by
  dsimp [stupidTrunc]
  infer_instance

name: HomologicalComplex.isZero_stupidTrunc_X
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
i' : ι'
hi' : ∀ (i : ι), Ne (e.f i) i'
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.IsZero ((K.stupidTrunc e).X i')
decl:
lemma isZero_stupidTrunc_X (i' : ι') (hi' : ∀ i, e.f i ≠ i') :
    IsZero ((K.stupidTrunc e).X i') :=
  isZero_extend_X _ _ _ hi'

name: HomologicalComplex.instIsStrictlySupportedStupidTrunc_1
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_3} C
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝¹ : e.IsRelIff
ι'' : Type u_4
c'' : ComplexShape ι''
e' : c''.Embedding c'
inst✝ : K.IsStrictlySupported e'
⊢ (K.stupidTrunc e).IsStrictlySupported e'
decl:
instance {ι'' : Type*} {c'' : ComplexShape ι''} (e' : c''.Embedding c')
    [K.IsStrictlySupported e'] :
    IsStrictlySupported (K.stupidTrunc e) e' where
  isZero i' hi' := by
    by_cases hi'' : ∃ i, e.f i = i'
    · obtain ⟨i, hi⟩ := hi''
      exact (K.isZero_X_of_isStrictlySupported e' i' hi').of_iso (K.stupidTruncXIso e hi)
    · apply isZero_stupidTrunc_X
      simpa using hi''

name: HomologicalComplex.isZero_stupidTrunc_iff
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
⊢ Iff (CategoryTheory.Limits.IsZero (K.stupidTrunc e)) (K.IsStrictlySupportedOutside e)
decl:
lemma isZero_stupidTrunc_iff :
    IsZero (K.stupidTrunc e) ↔ K.IsStrictlySupportedOutside e := by
  constructor
  · exact fun h ↦ ⟨fun i ↦
      ((eval _ _ (e.f i)).map_isZero h).of_iso (K.stupidTruncXIso e rfl).symm⟩
  · intro h
    rw [isZero_iff_isStrictlySupported_and_isStrictlySupportedOutside _ e]
    constructor
    · infer_instance
    · exact ⟨fun i ↦ (h.isZero i).of_iso (K.stupidTruncXIso e rfl)⟩

name: HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap_id
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
⊢ Eq (HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id K) e) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id (K.stupidTrunc e))
decl:
variable (K) in
@[simp]
lemma stupidTruncMap_id : stupidTruncMap (𝟙 K) e = 𝟙 _ := by
  simp [stupidTruncMap, stupidTrunc]

name: HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap_comp_assoc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
K L M : HomologicalComplex C c'
φ : Quiver.Hom K L
φ' : Quiver.Hom L M
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
Z : HomologicalComplex C c'
h : Quiver.Hom (M.stupidTrunc e) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp φ φ') e) h) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap φ e) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap φ' e) h))
decl:
@[simp, reassoc]
lemma stupidTruncMap_comp :
    stupidTruncMap (φ ≫ φ') e = stupidTruncMap φ e ≫ stupidTruncMap φ' e := by
  simp [stupidTruncMap, stupidTrunc]

name: HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap_stupidTruncXIso_hom
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
K L : HomologicalComplex C c'
φ : Quiver.Hom K L
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
i : ι
i' : ι'
hi : Eq (e.f i) i'
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap φ e).f i') (L.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom (φ.f i'))
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma stupidTruncMap_stupidTruncXIso_hom {i : ι} {i' : ι'} (hi : e.f i = i') :
    (stupidTruncMap φ e).f i' ≫ (L.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom =
      (K.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom ≫ φ.f i' := by
  subst hi
  simp [stupidTruncMap, stupidTruncXIso, extendMap_f _ _ rfl]

inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C

inst✝ : e.IsRelIff

⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap φ e).f i') (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (L.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (φ.f i') h))
decl:

lemma stupidTruncMap_stupidTruncXIso_hom {i : ι} {i' : ι'} (hi : e.f i = i') :
    (stupidTruncMap φ e).f i' ≫ (L.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom =
      (K.stupidTruncXIso e hi).hom ≫ φ.f i' := by

  simp [stupidTruncMap, stupidTruncXIso, extendMap_f _ _ rfl]

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.stupidTruncFunctor_obj
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
⊢ Eq ((e.stupidTruncFunctor C).obj K) (K.stupidTrunc e)
decl:
/-- The stupid truncation functor `HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c'`
given by an embedding `e : Embedding c c'` of complex shapes. -/
@[simps]
noncomputable def stupidTruncFunctor [e.IsRelIff] :
    HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c' where
  obj K := K.stupidTrunc e
  map φ := HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap φ e

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.stupidTruncFunctor_map
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
X✝ Y✝ : HomologicalComplex C c'
φ : Quiver.Hom X✝ Y✝
⊢ Eq ((e.stupidTruncFunctor C).map φ) (HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap φ e)
decl:
/-- The stupid truncation functor `HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c'`
given by an embedding `e : Embedding c c'` of complex shapes. -/
@[simps]
noncomputable def stupidTruncFunctor [e.IsRelIff] :
    HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c' where
  obj K := K.stupidTrunc e
  map φ := HomologicalComplex.stupidTruncMap φ e
